= Install =
 * Install [http://www.python.org/ Python]
 * Install [https://pypi.python.org/pypi/Shapely Shapley]
  * There are Ubuntu and Debian official package
 * Install [http://www.wxpython.org/ wxPython] for GUI version
  * There are Ubuntu and Debian official package


 * Download [https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B8iaNA6lo1s8dk1oLXNBcnczSlE/edit?usp=sharing pygerber2gcodeXX.zip] from Google Drive.
 * Uncompress the file
 * Run program by "python pygerber2gcode.py"
